upcoming.note: Delayed 2 days from original Feb 11 schedule due to partial govt shutdown. Morningstar warns persistent inflation ahead. Fed balancing above-target inflation with soft labor market.

economicCalendar.recentContext: Stronger-than-expected US jobs report spurred Treasury slide; traders pared Fed rate cut bets for 2026. Gold hit $5,000.

crypto.narrative: BTC range-bound below $70k. Memecoins and AI tokens leading gains. BNB and DOGE up ~4%. SOL flat.
